Mitchell Wilcox 12 Yd pass from Quinton Flowers (Emilio Nadelman Kick)

videos.headline: South Florida's Johnson leaps in for 1-yard TD
videos.description: D'Ernest Johnson jumps in for the 1-yard touchdown in the first quarter.

videos.headline: UConn's Bell comes up with the interception
videos.description: Tre Bell steps up and picks off Quinton Flowers for a UConn interception.

videos.headline: South Florida's Flowers connects with Wilcox for 12-yard TD
videos.description: Quinton Flowers floats it up to Mitchell Wilcox for a 12-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: UConn's  Shirreffs connects with Myers on 4th down for TD
videos.description: Bryant Shirreffs finds Tommy Myers for a 2-yard touchdown to bring UConn within a touchdown.

videos.headline: South Florida's Flowers finds  McCants for 38-yard pick up
videos.description: South Florida's Quinton Flowers connects with Tyre McCants for a 38-yard gain into UConn territory.

videos.headline: South Florida's Nichols comes up with interception to close out the first half
videos.description: Bryant Shirreffs pass is bobbled and  intercepted by Deatrick Nichols in the second quarter.

videos.headline: South Florida's Flowers finds Johnson for TD
videos.description: Quinton Flowers lobs it up to D'Ernest Johnson for a 11-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: South Florida's Flowers passes to Valdes-Scantling for long TD
videos.description: Quinton Flowers throws short to Marquez Valdes-Scantling who blows past all defenders for the 95-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: UConn's Mensah breaks free for TD
videos.description: Kevin Mensah finds space for the 23-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: South Florida's Pindell with the keeper for a  TD
videos.description: David Pindell keeps it and breaks free for the 10-yard touchdown.
